name: Semaphore Pro: NSC Practice
description: Semaphore Pro: The elite trainer for NCC Naval Wing cadets. Optimized for AINSC prep, it features SVG animations, tactical drills, and performance telemetry. Master naval signaling with an interactive dictionary and real-time accuracy tracking. Created by Cadet Vinayak Sen, 1 MP Naval Unit Bhopal. Mission-ready for future naval leaders.
